interestingFact: India is the most populous country in the world as of 2025.
China has the world's largest high-speed rail network.
The U.S. has the world's largest economy by nominal GDP.
Indonesia is the world's largest island country, with over 17,000 islands.
Pakistan is home to the world's second-highest mountain, K2.
Brazil is the largest country in South America by area and population.
Nigeria is the most populous country in Africa.
Bangladesh has one of the highest population densities in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
Mexico City is built on the ruins of the ancient Aztec city of Tenochtitlan.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
Ethiopia is one of the only African countries never to have been colonized.
The Philippines is made up of over 7,000 islands.
Egypt is home to the ancient pyramids and the Sphinx.
Vietnam is known for its lush landscapes and rich history.
The Congo River is the deepest river in the world.
Turkey spans two continents: Europe and Asia.
Iran is home to one of the world's oldest civilizations.
Germany is the most populous country in the European Union.
Thailand is the only Southeast Asian country never colonized by a European power.
France is the world's most visited country by tourists.
The UK is made up of four countries: England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.
Rome is home to the Vatican City, the smallest country in the world.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Bloemfontein, and Cape Town.
Nepal is home to Mount Everest, the tallest mountain in the world.
